title: CSS Menu Creator - Swimbi (Win 1.4.0)
description:
SWIMBI (Swift Menu Builder)
Best friend for webdesigner.
Advanced but intuitive CSS Menu creator software.

You are we still fighting with browser compatibility?
Stop wasting time with CSS hand-coding,
get working drop down menu or vertical flyout menu
on your website in few clicks.

CSS drop down menu without programming or CSS knowledge.

Good looking menu designs, a lot of options for customizations,
friendly drag-n-drop interface, 450+ icons, patters, effects,
animations, any colors, sizes, etc....

Windows v.1.4.0

What's new:
- vertical menus.
- handy ruler to see the width of menu everytime you change something.
- 450+ icons for menu items
- Responsive - mobile devices and touch screen support



Homepage: 
      <a href="
http://swimbi.com" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://swimbi.com</a>

Screenshots:    <a href="
http://swimbi.com/screenshots/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://swimbi.com/screenshots/</a>


Chrome extension (with limited functionality):    <a href="
https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/swimbi-css-menu-maker/oifipbbfaomegkfhpdbopinkndcdmaop" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/swimbi-css-menu-maker/oifipbbfaomegkfhpdbopinkndcdmaop</a>

Using Drop Down Menus for websites is a common and effective way to logically present your site links to website visitors.

Cross-browser compatibility 
Minimal code 
Easy to install
Perfect menu designs
Very flexible
Can be applied to any type of website
